title: President Biden to Order Federal Workers to Get Covid Shots
itunes:title: President Biden to Order Federal Workers to Get Covid Shots
description:
Dr. David Dowdy, Infectious Disease Epidemiologist at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, discusses concerns about employees returning to work as the delta variant pushes Covid cases higher. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Distressed Debt Reporter Lucca de Paoli talk about Lucca's Businessweek story The Simple Flaw That Sank Greensill’s Complex Financial Empire. Bloomberg News Technology Reporter Spencer Soper explains that Amazon is announcing a TV line to compete with Roku and Google. And we Drive to the Close with Noreen Beaman, President of Orion Advisor Solutions.

Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Sonali Basak. Producers: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
